Asian Grill: Authentic Japanese Takeout

Discover Asian Grill in Charleston, SC—a culinary journey through Japan. Savor our expertly crafted sushi rolls and flavorful Japanese dishes, all made with the freshest ingredients. Whether you're craving classic nigiri or inventive sashimi platters, our menu promises a delicious experience every time. Enjoy the convenience of takeout; place your online order now for an authentic taste of Asia at home!
